FwkSenCnt.MEANING: an Indian princess, either the wife or widow of a maharaja, or in her own right, ranking above a rani

ExCnt.EX: Each maharani changed the world she lived in , shaping the way modern women define themselves .
If he had not been born , you would not have remained the sole maharani . The maharaja could have married again .
